description:
A butterfly opening on this travel pack lets you go through security screenings without the hassle of removing your electronics. It's super-versatile even when not travelling. Separate compartments keep your office apart from your gym stuff, and lots of organizer pockets let you keep stuff accessible.

  • ActiveShield compartment with Polygiene StaysFresh® technology blocks dirt, moisture and odours to keep clean gear separate from dirty
  • Padded airmesh shoulder straps
  • Zippered front pocket has an internal organizer and a key clip
  • Quick access padded tablet sleeve
  • Fits 15in. laptop with TSA/security friendly panel
  • Side stretch-mesh pocket holds a water bottle or an umbrella
name: Gregory Border 30 Traveler - Unisex
